title: Zombie Cupcakes: From the Grave to the Table with 16 Cupcake Corpses
description: Combining two hot trends—zombies and cupcakes—makes for a monster baking title! Zombies never tasted so good!Conjuring up her inner George A. Romero, professional cake designer Zilly Rosen focuses her creative attention on crafting a legion of edible undead inside Zombie From the Grave to the Table with 16 Cupcake Corpses . With a nod to Romero's zombie franchise, Rosen offers instructions for crafting 16 terrifying treats, * Toxic Bite* Zombie Rising* Keep an Eye Out* Destroy the Brainand more!Readers can raise their own macabre multitude of Zombie Cupcakes creations from the undead with an average creation time of less than one hour. Each Zombie Cupcakes design includes a full-color photograph of the zombie creation at hand, as well as an illustrated instructional overview and a convenient sidebar list of every item you will need to complete the cupcake.
author: Zilly Rosen
